content_summary: The speaker discusses the role of electrophysiology in neuroscience, particularly in encoding cognitive features such as memories and preferences in the zebrafish brain. The speaker also highlights the evolution of electrophysiological networks, which process and link information across time and distance, predating the evolution of neurons, muscles, and brains.
